context: In 2024, Guidewire serves more than 570 carriers in 42 countries and reported 26.58% revenue growth in Q3 2024. The company has 83 active competitors and ranks 1st among 106 competitors. Guidewire InsuranceSuite has 4.58% market share in the insurance-administration-and-management category, competing with 216 tools. Insurers are exploring alternatives due to challenges like high costs, inflexible systems, and the need for rapid adaptation to market changes. The competitive landscape includes both specialized insurance software providers and large enterprise technology companies.
